answers.answer: Yeah, it's a symptom. That happened to me with my first pregnancy. But if you're concerned, you can always ask your doctor just to double check.
Try drinking more water. You could be dehydrated.

Im 33 weeks to and this has been happening to me too! Sooo annoying and gave me a finny head filling. My doctor said its just from a rise on hormones your vision changes in pregnancy just done worse than others
I've read that could be a sign of preeclampsia. Have you had your bp  checked recently?
My vision gets worse during pregnancy, then within a week of delivery it goes back to my norm. As long as your sugar and blood pressure is fine, its probably just hormones and extra blood flow.
It can also be caused by a change in blood pressure.

question: I am 33 weeks pregnant and my vision keeps getting blurry... I dont have GD and I dont wear glasses... So is this just a symptom or what???
title: Blurry vision while pregnant...
